question_text.description: This is the text of a question.

question_part_text.description: A question part is a subquestion of a question. If there is just one question part within a question, this field will be empty.

question_number.description: This gives the order of the question in the consultation.

question_part_number.description: This gives the order of the question part within the question. If not present, assume 1.

question_part_multiple_choice_options.description: All possible options for a closed question. Might not be present for free text question (or empty).

question_part_type.description: If not supplied, assume free-text question.
